Description: Up for grabs is a modified 2007 Gibson Les Paul Guitar of the Week (GOTW) #2 Classic Antique Fireburst. Original electronics were swapped before I purchaed it and are long gone. Guitar now has Sheptone Blue Sky humbuckers and they really have a nice woody tone in this guitar. Pots are the Gibson circuit card variety and the pickups were hard-wired to the circuit card - a bit of a kluge but the controls and selector switch work fine - just wanted to mention it. I will include four 500K traditional pots if you request them if you want to swap out the circuit card. Was thinking about doing this myself but the guitar sounds fine as is and I never got around to it.The control cavity and pickups routes are lined in foil for shielding. Frets have tons of life left. Guitar weighs in at around 8.5lbs. 60's neck profile. There are a few dings and normal playwear for a 12 year old guitar. Nothing major but not a case queen either. Pictures tell the story. Guitar is solid and plays great. Gibson black hardshell case included as shown. Gibson black reflector knobs on controls now. Original tuners replaced with grover kidney style. Low price due to mods (even though pickups are an upgrade in my opinion). Will ship to the lower 48 only with insurance and signature required on delivery. Not taking trades as I need to unload some gear! I reserve the right to end auction at any time. Thanks for looking!
Title: 2007 Gibson Les Paul Classic Antique Limited Fireburst with OHSC
